trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un'area con una sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: A LinearGradientBrush paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: LinearGradientBrush disegna un'area con una sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Sfumatura lineare definisce una sfumatura lungo una linea.

trans-unit.source: The line's end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Punto finale della linea sono definito per il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>le proprietà della sfumatura lineare.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A LinearGradientBrush brush paints its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> along this line.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un pennello LinearGradientBrush relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A>lungo questa riga.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Sfumatura lineare predefinita è diagonale.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted.
trans-unit.target: Nell'impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>di una sfumatura lineare è (0,0), nell'angolo superiore sinistro dell'area da disegnare e il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>è (1,1), nell'angolo inferiore destro dell'area da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: I colori della sfumatura risultante vengono interpolati lungo il percorso diagonale.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente mostra una sfumatura in diagonale.

trans-unit.source: A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: È stata aggiunta una riga per evidenziare il percorso di interpolazione della sfumatura dal punto di inizio e il punto finale.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: ![Asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "sull'asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale") una sfumatura lineare diagonale di seguito è illustrata lo stesso sfumatura lineare, ma con cursori sfumatura evidenziati.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted.
trans-unit.target: ![Cursori sfumatura in una sfumatura lineare](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "cursori sfumatura in una sfumatura lineare") una sfumatura lineare diagonale con cursori sfumatura evidenziati è possibile specificare un asse delle sfumature che riempie completamente l'area da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> property determines how the remaining area is painted.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>proprietà determina come viene disegnato l'area rimanente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A LinearGradientBrush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto Freezable LinearGradientBrush di una funzionalità è un tipo di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>dell'oggetto e pertanto può essere bloccato per migliorare le prestazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>funzionalità, ad esempio il blocco e la clonazione, vedere [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe che ha lo sfumatura specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>da impostare per questo tipo di pennello.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref> and angle.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe che ha specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref> e l'angolo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>da impostare per questo tipo di pennello.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'angolo, espresso in gradi, della sfumatura.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Un valore pari a 0,0 crea una sfumatura orizzontale, e un valore di 90.0 crea una sfumatura verticale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, end <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, and angle.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe che ha inizio specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, fine <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>e l'angolo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> offset 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> offset 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'angolo, espresso in gradi, della sfumatura.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Un valore pari a 0,0 crea una sfumatura orizzontale, e un valore di 90.0 crea una sfumatura verticale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified gradient stops, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe con sfumatura specificati <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>da impostare per questo tipo di pennello.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>della sfumatura.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>della sfumatura.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, end <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> classe che ha inizio specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, fine <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>Il pennello viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> offset 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> offset 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>della sfumatura.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>della sfumatura.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref>, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (), ma non possono risolvere non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> era di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiate, ma i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le coordinate bidimensionali finali della sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>Disegna una sfumatura lungo una linea.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and EndPoint properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: La riga punti iniziale e finale sono definiti <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>e le proprietà di EndPoint di <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Sfumatura lineare predefinita è diagonale.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its EndPoint is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: Nell'impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>di una sfumatura lineare è (0,0), nell'angolo superiore sinistro dell'area di compilazione e il relativo EndPoint è (1,1), nell'angolo inferiore destro dell'area riempita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: I colori della sfumatura risultante vengono interpolati lungo il percorso diagonale.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra una sfumatura in diagonale.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: La linea nera è stato aggiunto per evidenziare il percorso di interpolazione della sfumatura dal punto di inizio e il punto finale.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient ## Specifying Relative or Absolute Values Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its EndPoint is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ![Asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "sull'asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale") una sfumatura lineare diagonale # # specificando relativi o assoluti si noti che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>determina se l'EndPoint viene interpretato come valore assoluto o relativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the EndPoint value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>Specifica che il valore dell'EndPoint è relativo alle dimensioni dell'area disegnata.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the EndPoint value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>Specifica che il valore dell'EndPoint è espresso in DIP (device independent pixel).</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, making the EndPoint a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, rendendo l'EndPoint di un valore relativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Coordinate bidimensionali finali della sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: The default is (1,1).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è (1,1).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le coordinate bidimensionali iniziali della sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>Disegna una sfumatura lungo una linea.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the StartPoint and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: La riga punti iniziale e finale sono definiti per il punto iniziale e una <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Sfumatura lineare predefinita è diagonale.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the StartPoint of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: Nell'impostazione predefinita, il punto iniziale della sfumatura lineare è (0,0), nell'angolo superiore sinistro dell'area riempita e il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>è (1,1), nell'angolo inferiore destro dell'area riempita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: I colori della sfumatura risultante vengono interpolati lungo il percorso diagonale.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra una sfumatura in diagonale.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: La linea nera è stato aggiunto per evidenziare il percorso di interpolazione della sfumatura dal punto di inizio e il punto finale.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient ## Specifying Relative or Absolute Values Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its StartPoint is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ![Asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "sull'asse delle sfumature per sfumatura lineare diagonale") una sfumatura lineare diagonale # # specificando relativi o assoluti si noti che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>determina se il punto iniziale viene interpretato come valore assoluto o relativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>Specifica che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>valore è relativo alle dimensioni dell'area disegnata.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the StartPoint value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>Specifica che il punto iniziale valore è espresso in DIP (device independent pixel).</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, making the StartPoint a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, rendendo il punto iniziale di un valore relativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The starting two-dimensional coordinates for the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Le coordinate bidimensionali iniziali della sfumatura lineare.

trans-unit.source: The default is (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è (0, 0).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
